scenes.action_text: THE DANISH GIRL Written by Lucinda Coxon Based on the novel by David Ebershoff EXT. KATTEGAT SEA, JUTLAND, DENMARK, 1920'S, DAY FADE IN: A rectangle of ferociously stormy sea viewed from battered cliffs. Silver waves are whipped by a wind that flies at us, stinging, relentless. Somewhere, unseen in the barren landscape, something is at its mercy - we hear the RUSTLE and PUNCH of the weather going at it...
